titles.title: Show Me Thy Glory Lord (familiar last line tri

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Show me Thy glory Lord Oh let me see All that Thou art all that Thou hast for me And all that I some day may hope to be Show me Thy glory Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Show me the glory of my Savior's face Show me the fullness of His glorious grace And help me rise and claim my destined place In all His fullness Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Show me the glory of the things unseen Till earthly things shall lose their glittering sheen And nothing less can ever come between My heart and heaven Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh rend the veil of flesh and put aside All things in me that could Thy glory hide And in the Holiest let me abide With Thee forever Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give me more glimpses of the Lord of Light Some foretastes of their rapture and delight Who have their home where faith is lost in sight And sorrow ended Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Show my the glorious vision of the end When heaven shall at length to earth descend And all the endless ages we shall spend With Thee in glory Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need the vision Lord Oh let me see All that Thou art all that Thou hast for me And all that I some day may hope to see Show me Thy glory Lord{/lang-eng}
